channel.title: WHERE and HOW can I change character setting in [508] server?
channel.description:
WHERE and HOW can I change character setting in [508] server? Can anyone help me plz?
Thanx.

item.title: WHERE and HOW can I change character setting in [508] server?
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

What do you mean character settings but if you mean direct from the character file go to

bin -> data -> characters -> mainsave
Open the character file best way is using a wordpad and seach for what you want to edit and save it.

P.S: Make sure this account is not logged in at the time or it wont update.

Read full topic
item.source: WHERE and HOW can I change character setting in [508] server?
